data.title: Gavin Wood Made Multi-Chain NFTs A Reality On Polkadot & Kusama
data.text: Polkadot and Kusama have become the first blockchains to enable multi-chain NFTs following a key update to its consensus mechanism.  The update, which enables support for NFTs on the Cross-Consensus Message Format (XCM), will make it possible for the non-fungible tokens to be “teleported” from one chain to another and then tracked across chains.

data.title: Polkadot Parachain Parallel Finance Deploys Full Suite of DeFi Capabilities
data.text: The Polkadot and Kusama parachain hub Parallel Finance made a big splash in the DeFi space today, launching no less than six new products in one fell swoop.  The new products have been launched on Heiko Finance, which is Parallel Finance's deployment on Kusama, a public pre-production environment of the main Polkadot chain.

data.title: DAO Treasuries Top $8.2 Billion on Ethereum, $1.3B on Solana: DeepDAO
data.text: Analytics website DeepDAO began tracking data for DAOs built on Solana earlier this week.
